scripts.start: rimraf dist && rimraf node_modules && rollup --config rollup.config.js
scripts.build:browser: rimraf dist && rimraf node_modules && rollup --config build/rollup.config.browser.js
scripts.build:es: rimraf dist && rimraf node_modules && rollup --config build/rollup.config.es.js
scripts.build:umd: rimraf dist && rimraf node_modules && rollup --config build/rollup.config.umd.js
